product_title: Lennon Tie Waist Linen & Cotton Jumpsuit
product_description: Stripe your way into summery days in this lovely and laid-back jumpsuit, cut from a soft blend of linen and cotton and defined at the waist with a simple sash.
product_details_and_care:
Stripe your way into summery days in this lovely and laid-back jumpsuit, cut from a soft blend of linen and cotton and defined at the waist with a simple sash.
51" length; 22 1/2" inseam; 14" leg opening
Hidden back-zip closure
V-neck and back
Sleeveless
Front patch pockets
Removable sash
55% linen, 45% cotton
Machine wash, tumble dry
Imported
